name: ARVALIS -Institut du végétal
memberOrga: The Arvalis board comprises 36 farmers  representatives  of professional bodies, cooperatives, development, other applied research institutes, ...
goal: Arvalis is an applied research institute dedicated to arable crops. It helps farmers and advisors in agriculture sector to improve practices taking into account competiveness market requirements and environmental protection.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Environment, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Arvalis is interested on EU activities on crop protection, fertilisation, soils, environment, quality and common agricultural policy
